did.head: Descriptive Summary

did.unittitle: Re-reading of the William Faulkner Funeral Service, 1962

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Re-reading of the William Faulkner Funeral Service, Accession #7897 , Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was a gift of C. Lamar Wallie, Director of the Memphis Public Library, Memphis, Tennessee on April 23, 1965.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection contains a tape-recording of a re-reading of the William Faulkner funeral service by Reverend Duncan Gray.
